message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, $12,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider $17,000, which is a more reasonable compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
